messages.agent_message: Would you like to create a new account?
What type of account would you like me to make for you?
messages.user_message: I really need a retirement fund account, please create one.

messages.agent_message: Ok. Your new account was created, but you need to transfer some funds into this new account to open it. If you specify an account, I can transfer a small amount of funds from that to your new account.
Please specify the account you want to select.
messages.user_message: I want to use chequing for this.

messages.agent_message: Ok! I just created a retirement fund account and transferred starter funds into it from chequing.
Would you like to e-transfer any money to your contacts?
Alright, who would you like to send funds to and how much?
messages.user_message: I want to transfer 5000 to Bob.

messages.agent_message: Which account would you like to use?
All done! I just e-transferred 5000 to Bob from chequing.
Would you like to pay off your outstanding bills today?
Ok! I won't pay off your outstanding bills today.
Are you waiting for funds from any of your contacts?
Ok! I won't request money from any of your contacts today.
Are you looking to perform any transfers beween your accounts today?
Ok, how much money do you want to send and between which accounts?
messages.user_message: I want to transfer 5000 from chequing to retirement fund.

messages.agent_message: Ok! I successfully transferred your requested amount of 5000 from chequing to retirement fund.
Completed all bank actions for today. Thank you!
